title: #2 - What Staff Officers actually do (21st Century) - Interview with Australian Officer
itunes:title: #2 - What Staff Officers actually do (21st Century) - Interview with Australian Officer
itunes:subtitle: In this podcast I talk to Sol - an officer of theâ€¦
description:
In this podcast I talk to Sol - an officer of the Australian Defence Force - about what a military (general) staff does in general, what staff positions there are (continental staff system), what a staff officers really do by an example and some organizational aspects.Disclaimer: All views expressed by Sol are his personal views.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
